Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; WRITTEN WITH A REED PEN/REED WITH SPLIT NIB
Name: Demotic ostracon
Description: This  ostracon, which dates from the year 23/24 of our time, bears a badly effaced Demotic text. It refers to a tax reciept for the maintenance of the embankments. The scribe Kephalos, son of Pikos, is attested in other documents.
